author: Daniel Greene

Welcome back to Fantasy News!
This week: Tolkien’s actual writing desk is up for sale, Lord of the Rings extended editions return to cinemas, and AI-written books make their way into major stores. Plus — Dragonsteel Nexus announcements, a Red Rising collector’s edition reveal, and the latest on Netflix and Paramount’s war over Warner Bros.
